description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A fast-paced shooter with significant RPG elements.  Level up, customize, and upgrade your ship with various skills, attributes, and tools of destruction as you destroy countless enemies, race through waves of peril, and battle epic bosses.
description.short: A fast-paced shooter with significant RPG elements.  Level up, customize, and upgrade your ship with various skills, attributes, and tools of destruction as you destroy countless enemies, race through waves of peril, and battle epic bosses.
